sqlQuery.name: ProjectId
sqlQuery.sql: select * from (SELECT distinct project_id as internal, project_id as term, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as display FROM metrics.SEARCHESSTATS@USER_DBLINK@) ORDER BY display
